headline: Is Halliburton Offering Value After Recent Energy Price Moves and Mixed Share Performance?
summary: Wondering if Halliburton is quietly turning into a value opportunity, or if the market is correctly pricing in its risks right now? The stock has climbed 7.9% over the last week and 3.8% over the past month, but is still roughly flat year to date at 0.4% and down 4.5% over the last year, even though the 5 year return sits at 52.3%. Recent moves in energy prices and shifting expectations around drilling activity have helped refocus attention on oilfield service names like Halliburton, as...

headline: Halliburton (HAL): Reassessing Valuation After a Recent Short-Term Share Price Rebound
summary: Halliburton (HAL) has quietly pushed higher over the past week, adding roughly 8% and outpacing much of the energy sector, even as its one year return still sits slightly in the red. See our latest analysis for Halliburton. That recent 7 day share price return of 7.91% and a strong 90 day share price return of 25.93% suggest momentum is rebuilding, even though the 1 year total shareholder return remains slightly negative and the 5 year total shareholder return is still comfortably...
